alert.note: Alert for Cumberland (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued September 23 at 7:55PM EDT until September 24 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM TO 9 PM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Tidal areas in Cumberland County, New Jersey. * WHEN...From 300 PM until 9:00 PM Sunday. * IMPACTS...At this level, widespread roadway flooding occurs in coastal and bayside communities and along inland tidal waterways. Many roads become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional rounds of minor tidal flooding are possible into the new week. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Maurice River at Bivalve MLLW Categories - Minor 7.6 ft, Moderate 8.6 ft, Major 9.6 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 2.3 ft, Major 3.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 24/05 AM 6.4 0.1 1.5 None 24/05 PM 8.0 1.7 1.8 Minor 25/06 AM 5.9 -0.4 0.8 None 25/06 PM 7.1 0.8 0.7 None 26/07 AM 6.7 0.4 1.2 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
